definition: a pleasant change/a breath of fresh air/refreshing
a slap on the face/CL:記|记[ji4]
what's frequently heard can be repeated in detail (idiom)
(of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on

sentences.english: What is your reflection upon Samuel's retirement speech?
sentences.chinese: 你對撒母耳的退休演講有何感想？

sentences.english: The audience ate up everything he said.
sentences.chinese: 聽衆們聆耳恭聽他所說的每一句話。

sentences.english: As he, in his swooning ears, the choir's amen.
sentences.chinese: 神魂顛倒的耳中，只想聽到唱詩班的歌。

sentences.english: Nobody has conducted research looking at the health effects of Bluetooth earpieces.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人研究過藍牙耳機會不會對健康造成影響。

sentences.english: Although they are plays on words, the scholars can choose one or two of them.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲遊戲筆墨，但治學者或當有一二可取者耳。

sentences.english: Her father, Joel, is an ophthalmologist.
sentences.chinese: 父親約耳是位眼科醫師。

sentences.english: First he says the woman really did see Samuel.
sentences.chinese: 首先他說這個女人真的看到了撒母耳。

sentences.english: Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.
sentences.chinese: 祕耳焊工具有所有被它放逐之牌的所有起動式異能。

sentences.english: The sound of the careless passage of the jungle wayfarer come to the ear of the animal.
sentences.chinese: 叢林裏旅人漫不經心穿過的聲音傳到了動物的耳裏。

sentences.english: Boyle's law is a scientific principle.
sentences.chinese: 玻意耳定律是一項科學原理。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the boy Samuel grew up in the presence of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子撒母耳在耶和華面前漸漸長大。

sentences.english: He holds a wolf by the ears.
Uncropped ears should be short and held rose or half prick.
sentences.chinese: 不裁耳應該是短小的玫瑰耳或半折耳。

sentences.english: Uncropped ears should be short and held rose or half prick.
sentences.chinese: 不裁耳應該是短小的玫瑰耳或半折耳。

sentences.english: Uncropped ears should be short and held rose or half prick.
sentences.chinese: 不裁耳應該是短小的玫瑰耳或半折耳。

sentences.english: This morning I listened to my ipod and there's a song that I never tune to.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我聽耳機時，聽見一首我從未播過的。

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
